I would just like those of you to know that if the prices haven't changed yet, don't worry! There is a delay between NA and OCE so the changes will occur just a little later! By just a little later I don't know the exact time delay! This occurs for all sales including things like the bonus RP at the start and so on..... Keep this in mind later on if a change of price hasn't occurred.
